
            <div class="postcontent">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<p>本文用于绘制性能折线图，适用于对比实验，发现很多博文都是收费，欺负哥们懒得学习，一气之下ai了一下再进行代码修改，免费供给大家学习参考，便于大家撰写论文数据时利于绘制图像，节约时间。</p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">import</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> pandas as pd
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">import</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> matplotlib.pyplot as plt

</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">#</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 读取CSV文件，替换成自己的绝对路径</span>
datav12_cdm = pd.read_csv(<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">/mnt/user/qianzhu/YOLO/v12/yolov12-main/results/v12n-cdm/results.csv</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">)
datav12n </span>=  pd.read_csv(<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">/mnt/user/qianzhu/YOLO/v12/yolov12-main/results/v12n/results.csv</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">)
datav11n </span>= pd.read_csv(<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">/mnt/user/qianzhu/YOLO/v12/yolov12-main/results/v11n/results.csv</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">)
datav10n </span>= pd.read_csv(<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">/mnt/user/qianzhu/YOLO/v12/yolov12-main/results/v10n/results.csv</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">)
datav8n </span>= pd.read_csv(<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">/mnt/user/qianzhu/YOLO/v12/yolov12-main/results/v8n/results.csv</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">)
datav6n </span>= pd.read_csv(<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">/mnt/user/qianzhu/YOLO/v12/yolov12-main/results/v6n/results.csv</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">)


</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">#</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 单独获取每个模型的metrics/mAP50-95(B)列的数据</span>
v12_cdm = datav12_cdm[<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">metrics/mAP50-95(B)</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">]
v12 </span>= datav12n[<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">metrics/mAP50-95(B)</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">]
v11 </span>= datav11n[<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">metrics/mAP50-95(B)</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">]
v10 </span>= datav10n[<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">metrics/mAP50-95(B)</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">]
v8 </span>= datav8n[<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">metrics/mAP50-95(B)</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">]
v6 </span>= datav6n[<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">metrics/mAP50-95(B)</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">]


</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">#</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 获取epochs列的数据，并从第20个数据开始取值每隔20个epochs取一次；训练的mAP50-95(B也是同理</span>
epochs = datav12_cdm[<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">epoch</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>][19::20<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">]
v12cdmd </span>= v12_cdm[19::20<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">]
v12d </span>= v12[19::20<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">]
v11d </span>= v11[19::20<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">]
v10d </span>= v10[19::20<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">]
v8d </span>= v8[19::20<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">]
v6d </span>= v6[19::20<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">]


</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">#</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 绘制折线图，如果需要改动自己去查一下这个plt.plot函数中的参数怎么设置</span>
plt.plot(epochs, v12cdmd, label=<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">YOLOv12n-CDM(our)</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, marker=<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">o</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>,color=<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">c</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">)
plt.plot(epochs, v12d, label</span>=<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">YOLOv12n</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, color=<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">green</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>,linestyle=<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">--</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>,alpha=0.8<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">)
plt.plot(epochs, v11d, label</span>=<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">YOLOv11n</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, color=<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">blue</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>,linestyle=<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">--</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>,alpha=0.8<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">)
plt.plot(epochs, v10d, label</span>=<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">YOLOv10n</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>,color=<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">black</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>,linestyle=<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">--</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>,alpha=0.8<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">)
plt.plot(epochs, v8d, label</span>=<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">YOLOv8n</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>,color=<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">yellow</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>,linestyle=<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">--</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>,alpha=0.8<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">)
plt.plot(epochs, v6d, label</span>=<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">YOLOv6n</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, color=<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">red</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>,linestyle=<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">--</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>,alpha=0.8<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">)


</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">#</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">设置图标题，x坐标名字，y坐标名字</span>
plt.title(<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">Object Detection</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">)
plt.xlabel(</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">epochs</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">)
plt.ylabel(</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">map50-95(B)</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">)



</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">#</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 添加图例，在右下角，默认在左上角</span>
plt.legend(loc=<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">lower right</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">)

</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">#</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 设置网格线</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">plt.grid(True)

</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">#</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 保存图像到同目录下,换成自己要保存的名字，也可以使用绝对路径进行存储</span>
plt.savefig(<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">20.png</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>)</pre>
</div>
<p>最终效果：</p>
